item.title: Google Spreadsheets Paper Test
item.description: I was aspired by the alpaca’s idea of using google spreadsheet as a test environment for auto algo trading. So I decided to make a version for bitcoin paper test trading. For alpaca’s stock version, you can find the details here. The google spreadsheet will look like this: I am using coinbase api to get the lastest Bitcoin price. And there is already one google app script class that you can use - Class UrlFetchApp.
